title: MTDFB - API 56 v1.0 Submit 9-Box Vat Return

periodKey.title: The key to identify the return period
periodKey.description: A 4 character string identifier, format nnAA or nnAn or #nnn or  nnnn e.g. 17GH, 17B2, #001, 0918 (VMF Period Key, added for VAT Hybrid)

vatDueSales.title: Vat due on sales
vatDueSales.description: Total VAT due on Total Sales

vatDueAcquisitions.title: VAT due on acquisitions
vatDueAcquisitions.description: Total VAT due on acquisitions from EC Member States

vatDueTotal.title: Total VAT due
vatDueTotal.description: SUM of (1) and (2) (Calculated by agent software)

vatReclaimedCurrPeriod.title: Total VAT reclaimed
vatReclaimedCurrPeriod.description: Total VAT reclaimed on total purchases and other inputs

vatDueNet.title: Net VAT due
vatDueNet.description: DIFFERENCE between (3) and (4) (Calculated by agent software)

totalValueSalesExVAT.title: Total sales
totalValueSalesExVAT.description: Total sales excluding VAT (including exempt sales)

totalValuePurchasesExVAT.title: Total purchases
totalValuePurchasesExVAT.description: Total purchases excluding VAT (including exempt purchases)

totalValueGoodsSuppliedExVAT.title: Total supply
totalValueGoodsSuppliedExVAT.description: Total supply of goods, excluding VAT, to EC Member States

totalAllAcquisitionsExVAT.title: Total acquisitions
totalAllAcquisitionsExVAT.description: Total acquisitions of goods, excluding VAT, from EC Member States

agentReferenceNumber.title: Agent Reference Number
agentReferenceNumber.description: Agent Reference Number. Populated if call is made by Agent and the  Agent has a ARN. The pattern and example are copied from DES API#28 specification

receivedAt.title: The date & time the return was received by MDTP API
receivedAt.description: The date & time the return was received by MDTP API. UTC timezone

uniqueID.description: In case of SCAN channel, a unique scan reference ID must be  provided

monetaryPos_13.description: Defines a monetary value (to 2 decimal places), between 0 and  99,999,999,999.99

monetaryPosNeg.description: Defines a monetary value (to 2 decimal places), between  -9,999,999,999,999.99 and 9,999,999,999,999.99
